description.zh-cn: 上海报业集团在上海出版的一份综合性报纸，以知识分子为主要读者对象，以文化、人文领域为主要报道内容。
description.en: A comprehensive newspaper published by Shanghai United Media Group in Shanghai, targeting intellectuals with a focus on culture and humanities.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》的拥有者，中国的报业集团。
description.en: The owner of Wenhui Bao, a Chinese newspaper group.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》的创办人之一，爱国人士。
description.en: One of the founders of Wenhui Bao, a patriot.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由汪精卫等人在南京成立的政权。
description.en: A regime established in Nanjing by Wang Jingwei and others during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the period of political tutelage.

description.zh-cn: 由上海《文汇报》主体在香港创办的报纸。
description.en: A newspaper founded in Hong Kong by the main staff of the Shanghai Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名报人，曾任《文汇报》社长兼总编辑。
description.en: A famous Chinese journalist who served as the president and editor-in-chief of Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1950年代对民族资本主义工商业进行社会主义改造的政策。
description.en: A policy of socialist transformation of national capitalist industry and commerce in the People's Republic of China during the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部机关报，文汇报社曾参与创办。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, which Wenhui Bao Agency participated in founding.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前高层领导人。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发起的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign launched in mainland China in 1957.

nodes.id: 文汇报的资产阶级方向应当批判

zh-cn: 文汇报的资产阶级方向应当批判
en: The Bourgeois Orientation of Wenhui Bao Should Be Criticized

description.zh-cn: 1957年7月1日《人民日报》发表的由毛泽东起草的社论。
description.en: An editorial drafted by Mao Zedong and published in the People's Daily on July 1, 1957.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间响应毛泽东的号召，对当权的领导干部进行批判和斗争的群众组织。
description.en: Mass organizations during the Cultural Revolution that responded to Mao Zedong's call to criticize and struggle against incumbent leading cadres.

en: Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命后，中国官方对林彪和“四人帮”两个集团的合称。
description.en: The official Chinese designation after the Cultural Revolution for the two cliques of Lin Biao and the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国改革开放和现代化建设的总设计师。
description.en: The chief architect of China's reform and opening-up and modernization.

description.zh-cn: 指纠正文化大革命期间及以前“左”倾错误的思想、政策和冤假错案。
description.en: Refers to the correction of the 'leftist' ideological, political, and legal errors of the Cultural Revolution and earlier periods.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》前总编辑。
description.en: Former editor-in-chief of Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 中国书法家，《文汇报》创刊时报头的题写者。
description.en: A Chinese calligrapher who wrote the masthead for the inaugural issue of Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，小说《伤痕》的作者。
description.en: A Chinese writer, author of the novel 'The Scar'.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所著名综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A prestigious comprehensive research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 由复旦大学学生卢新华创作的短篇小说，于1978年在《文汇报》上发表，是伤痕文学的代表作。
description.en: A short story written by Fudan University student Lu Xinhua, published in Wenhui Bao in 1978, representative of Scar literature.

description.zh-cn: 一部中国话剧，1978年在上海上演时，《文汇报》的报道使其产生了全国影响。
description.en: A Chinese play, whose national impact was generated by Wenhui Bao's reporting when it was staged in Shanghai in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 由《文汇报》创办的报刊，后并入《文汇报》成为专版。
description.en: A newspaper founded by Wenhui Bao, later merged into Wenhui Bao as a special section.

description.zh-cn: 由《文汇报》设立的出版社。
description.en: A publishing house established by Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 一份上海的文学类报纸，后并入《文汇报》。
description.en: A literature-focused newspaper in Shanghai, later merged into Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 上海报业集团旗下的新媒体平台，整合了文汇报的客户端等资源。
description.en: A new media platform under Shanghai United Media Group, which integrated resources such as Wenhui Bao's mobile app.

nodes.id: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

zh-cn: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》
en: On the New Historical Play 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'

description.zh-cn: 1965年发表于《文汇报》的文章，被认为是文化大革命的导火索。
description.en: An article published in Wenhui Bao in 1965, considered the catalyst for the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 一部新编历史京剧，对该剧的批判揭开了文化大革命的序幕。
description.en: A newly composed historical Peking opera, the criticism of which marked the beginning of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1976年因悼念周恩来而发生的群众性抗议事件。
description.en: A mass protest that occurred in 1976 to commemorate Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家。
description.en: A Chinese economist.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一种经济体制模式。
description.en: An economic system model in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》由上海报业集团拥有和出版。
description.en: Wenhui Bao is owned and published by the Shanghai United Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 严宝礼等人集资创办了《文汇报》。
description.en: Yan Baoli and others raised funds to found Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫政权强制《文汇报》停刊。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime forced Wenhui Bao to cease publication.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府以“意图颠覆政府”等罪名勒令《文汇报》停刊。
description.en: The Nationalist Government ordered Wenhui Bao to cease publication on charges such as 'intending to subvert the government'.

description.zh-cn: 上海《文汇报》停刊后，报社主体赴香港创办了香港《文汇报》。
description.en: After the Shanghai Wenhui Bao was shut down, its main staff went to Hong Kong to found the Hong Kong Wen Wei Po.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中共接收上海后，《文汇报》得以复刊。1956年，经中共中央决定，《文汇报》迁回上海复刊。
description.en: After the CPC took over Shanghai in 1949, Wenhui Bao was allowed to resume publication. In 1956, by a decision of the CPC Central Committee, Wenhui Bao moved back to Shanghai and resumed publication.

description.zh-cn: 1949年《文汇报》复刊后，徐铸成任社长兼总编辑。
description.en: After Wenhui Bao resumed publication in 1949, Xu Zhucheng served as its president and editor-in-chief.

description.zh-cn: 1953年，《文汇报》实行公私合营。
description.en: In 1953, Wenhui Bao became a public-private partnership.

description.zh-cn: 1956年，文汇报社迁往北京，参加创办教育部机关报《教师报》。
description.en: In 1956, the Wenhui Bao agency moved to Beijing to participate in the founding of the Ministry of Education's official newspaper, Jiaoshi Bao.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在1957年3月的一次座谈会上赞扬《文汇报》办得好。
description.en: Mao Zedong praised Wenhui Bao for its quality at a symposium in March 1957.

description.zh-cn: 在康生的介绍下，徐铸成与毛泽东会面。
description.en: Xu Zhucheng met with Mao Zedong through an introduction by Kang Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 在反右运动中，《文汇报》受到批判。
description.en: During the Anti-Rightist Campaign, Wenhui Bao was criticized.

relationships.target: 文汇报的资产阶级方向应当批判

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东起草了社论《文汇报的资产阶级方向应当批判》。
description.en: Mao Zedong drafted the editorial 'The Bourgeois Orientation of Wenhui Bao Should Be Criticized'.

relationships.source: 文汇报的资产阶级方向应当批判

description.zh-cn: 该社论批评了《文汇报》的资产阶级方向。
description.en: The editorial criticized the bourgeois orientation of Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，《文汇报》被“造反派”夺权，成为“林彪、江青反革命集团”的一个宣传渠道。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Wenhui Bao was seized by 'rebel factions' and became a propaganda channel for the 'Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques'.

description.zh-cn: “造反派”夺取了《文汇报》的控制权。
description.en: The 'rebel faction' seized control of Wenhui Bao.

description.zh-cn: 文革结束后，《文汇报》被“拨乱反正”，纠正了文革期间的错误宣传。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution, Wenhui Bao underwent 'Boluan Fanzheng' to correct the erroneous propaganda of the period.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》的报头一度改用华国锋的题字。
description.en: The masthead of Wenhui Bao was temporarily changed to calligraphy by Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》的报头在创刊时及1981年后均使用书法家谭泽闿的手写体。
description.en: The masthead of Wenhui Bao used the calligraphy of Tan Zekai at its founding and again after 1981.

description.zh-cn: 卢新华创作《伤痕》时是复旦大学的学生。
description.en: Lu Xinhua was a student at Fudan University when he wrote 'The Scar'.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》全文刊登了卢新华的小说《伤痕》，引发社会强烈反响。
description.en: Wenhui Bao published Lu Xinhua's novel 'The Scar' in full, causing a strong public reaction.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》最先对上演的话剧《于无声处》进行报道，形成了全国影响。
description.en: Wenhui Bao was the first to report on the play 'In a Land of Silence', creating a nationwide impact.

description.zh-cn: 1985年5月，《文汇报》设立了文汇出版社。
description.en: In May 1985, Wenhui Bao established Wenhui Publishing House.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇读书周报》并入《文汇报》，成为其专版。
description.en: Wenhui Reading Weekly was merged into Wenhui Bao, becoming one of its special sections.

description.zh-cn: 《文学报》并入《文汇报》，改为《文学》周刊。
description.en: Literature News was merged into Wenhui Bao and changed to the 'Literature' weekly supplement.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》所属的文汇网、文汇客户端等新媒体平台并入上观新闻。
description.en: New media platforms affiliated with Wenhui Bao, such as its website and mobile app, were merged into Shanghai Observer.

relationships.target: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》发表了文章《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: Wenhui Bao published the article 'On the New Historical Play Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

relationships.source: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 该文章严厉批评了历史剧《海瑞罢官》。
description.en: The article severely criticized the historical play 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

relationships.source: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 该文章的发表揭开了文化大革命的序幕。
description.en: The publication of this article marked the beginning of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》在报道中遗漏周恩来题词等行为，引发了南京学生和工人的揭露，最终导致了四五运动。
description.en: Wenhui Bao's omission of Zhou Enlai's inscription in its reports was exposed by students and workers in Nanjing, which eventually led to the Tiananmen Incident of 1976.

description.zh-cn: 《文汇报》通过刊发对经济学家刘国光的访谈，在中国大陆报纸中首次采用了“社会主义市场经济”的概念。
description.en: Through publishing an interview with economist Liu Guoguang, Wenhui Bao was the first newspaper in mainland China to use the concept of 'socialist market economy'.
